Package tripleplay.game

Interface Summary
ScreenStack.Predicate Used to operate on screens.
ScreenStack.Transition Implements a particular screen transition.
 

Class Summary
AnimScreen An abstract screen that will contain animations.
Screen Contains the UI for a single game screen.
ScreenStack Manages a stack of screens.
UIAnimScreen An abstract screen that contains UI and animations.
UIScreen An abstract screen that will contain a user interface.
 

Enum Summary
ScreenStack.Transition.Dir Direction constants, used by transitions.
